name: Hungry Heist
description:
Eat as much food as you can without getting caught! Give in to your temptation to snag some pizza, and a new round will start.  How much food will you be able to scoop up before the fun's over?

A short game made with SFML, inspired by my cat. 

Controls:
  • Run Left: A
  • Run Right: D
  • Jump: Spacebar
